thread.title: Erin Heatherton is the sexiest ceremonial pitcher we've ever seen - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: Erin Heatherton is the sexiest ceremonial pitcher we've ever seen - Swim Daily - SI.com

author: Kelsey Hendrix
title: Erin Heatherton is the sexiest ceremonial pitcher we've ever seen - Swim Daily
text:
by Kelsey Hendrix Posted: Mon Oct. 5, 2015 The MLB regular season may be over, but things at Citi Field are just HEATING UP!
On Saturday night, SI Swimsuit rookie and The Northwest Company's Brand Ambassador Erin Heatherton threw out the ceremonial first pitch at the Mets/Nationals game, and instantly became the sexiest pitcher we've ever laid eyes on. With solid form and and even more solid smile, Erin looked just the part and even cozied up to Mr. Met before the start of the game.
Photo: Ben Gabbe/Getty Images
Photo: Ben Gabbe/Getty Images The first 15,000 fans to arrive at Citi Field on Saturday were greeted with a complimentary Northwest Mets Fleece Blanket, as modeled by our girl, Erin.
Photo: Ben Gabbe/Getty Images
Photo: Ben Gabbe/Getty Images The Northwest Company is a leader in the home textile industry and specializes in sports-themed throws and blankets. Through her partnership with them, Erin has been able to combine her love of sports, fashion and entertainment via events like her first pitch, involvement with NFL apparel , and beyond. Is there anything better than a gorgeous SI Swimsuit model who also loves sports? We certainly don't think so!
BONUS: See some of Erin's best moments from SI Swimsuit 2015!
